list_definition.definition: (with to) to begin to use, do etc as a way of solving a problem etc when other methods have failed

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He couldn’t persuade people to do what he wanted, so he resorted to threats of violence.

list_definition.definition: a place visited by many people (especially for holidays)
